bio.p: Pejman Ghassemi received his MS and PhD degrees in biomedical engineering from Tarbiat-Modares University in Iran. He received his PhD in electrical engineering from the Catholic University of America in Washington DC. He pursued his postdoctoral training at FDA’s Optical Diagnostic Devices Laboratory. His research interests include optical imaging, tissue oximetry, infrared thermography, and laser safety. In 2018, he joined the FDA’s Office of Product Evaluation and Quality as a scientific lead reviewer.
